name: @elevenyellow/crypto-address-validator
description: Wallet address validator for Bitcoin and other Altcoins.
author: Swyftx

scripts.test:browser: echo Temp bypass until jenkins setup
scripts.test: yarn run bundle && yarn run minify && npm run test:node && npm run test:browser
scripts.start: npm run bundle && npm run minify && npm test
scripts.generateReadme: node debug/generateReadme.js && git add README.md dist/wallet-address-validator.min.js.gz package.json
scripts.createMin: yarn run bundle && yarn run minify && git add dist/wallet-address-validator.js dist/wallet-address-validator.min.js
scripts.preversion: yarn run createMin && yarn run generateReadme
scripts.postversion: git push origin HEAD --follow-tags && hub pull-request -o -b dev -m v%npm_package_version%
